channel.title: Tools on Software Engineer made in Wales but working in Germany - Danny Croft
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Software Engineer made in Wales but working in Germany - Danny Croft

item.title: Javascript Development Workflow of 2013
item.description: The past two years have given us a wealth of tools and editor innovation that makes developing web apps more fun and certainly more productive. Learn what a modern development workflow looks like, from editors and plugins, to authoring abstractions, testing and DVCS integration - Paul Irish

item.title: Introduction to Backbone.js
item.description: A brief introduction to Backbone by Thomas Gorissen.

item.title: Google I/O 2010 – Google Chrome’s developer tools
item.description: In this session we'll give an overview of Developer Tools for Google Chrome that is a part of the standard Chrome distribution. Chrome Developer Tools allow inspecting, debugging and tuning the web applications and many more. In addition to this overview we would like to share some implementation details of the Developer Tools features and call for your contribution.
